  • Constructor Details

    • Pawn

      public Pawn​(boolean white, String name, boolean firstMove)
      creates a Pawn, a chess piece that can move one space forward, however capture pieces diagonally
      Parameters:
      white - whether it's a white piece or a black piece
      name - output string that will be shown in the ascii art
      firstMove - shows whether or not this is its first move or not

  • Method Details

    • isValidMoveWhite

      public static boolean isValidMoveWhite​(int initial_col, int initial_row, int end_col, int end_row, ChessPiece[][] board, Pawn o)
      This is a boolean method to check if the Pawn can be moved from its initial spot to the end spot that we're trying to get to. This is specific to white pawns since white pawns move in a different direction than black pawns
      Parameters:
      initial_col - initial column that the Pawn resides in
      initial_row - initial row that the Pawn resides in
      end_col - column that we're trying to move the Bishop to
      end_row - row that we're trying to move the Bishop to
      board - the 2D array of Chess pieces that contains the Knight
      o - the actual Pawn object in the 2D array
      Returns:
      whether or not the move from [initial_row][initial_col] to [end_row][end_col] can be executed

    • isValidMoveBlack

      public static boolean isValidMoveBlack​(int initial_col, int initial_row, int end_col, int end_row, ChessPiece[][] board, Pawn o)
      This is a boolean method to check if the Pawn can be moved from its initial spot to the end spot that we're trying to get to. This is specific to black pawns since black pawns move in a different direction than white pawns
      Parameters:
      initial_col - initial column that the Pawn resides in
      initial_row - initial row that the Pawn resides in
      end_col - column that we're trying to move the Bishop to
      end_row - row that we're trying to move the Bishop to
      board - the 2D array of Chess pieces that contains the Knight
      o - the actual Pawn object in the 2D array
      Returns:
      whether or not the move from [initial_row][initial_col] to [end_row][end_col] can be executed

    • inEnpassant

      public static boolean inEnpassant​(Pawn o, ArrayList<Pawn> list)
      method to see if there's an object in the list
      Parameters:
      o - object we're checking if it's in the arrayList
      list - list of pawns that just made their first double spaced move
      Returns:
      if the o object is in the list

    • Check

      public static boolean Check​(int row, int col, ChessPiece[][] board, ChessPiece o)
      This method checks there's any pawns attacking a specific space
      Parameters:
      row - row that we're checking is being attacked
      col - column that we're checking is being attacked
      board - 2D array that simulates a chess board
      o - the King object or the object that is being attacked
      Returns:
      whether or not there's a pawn attacking this object o
